com.jasonlafrance.wtbbackend.gtfs

Class StopAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jasonlafrance.wtbbackend.gtfs.StopAdapter

  • public class StopAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    StopAdapter class to allow redundant Stop representation without needing to allocate entirely new Stop objects. This is basically just a wrapper class for additional values: a stop time, a route association, and a reference to the next stop in the route.
    Author:
    Jason LaFrance
